tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    interests TEXT,
    purchase_history JSON
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerProfiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_age INT,
    customer_location VARCHAR(100),
    customer_interests VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductRecommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    recommendation_type VARCHAR(50),
    recommendation_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerProfiles(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE website_content (
    page_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title VARCHAR(100),
    content_description TEXT,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE product_recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    recommendation_type VARCHAR(50),
    recommendation_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerProfiles ( 
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  customer_name TEXT, 
  age INT, 
  gender TEXT, 
  location TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE WebsiteContent ( 
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  content_title TEXT, 
  content_description TEXT, 
  content_type TEXT, 
  published_date TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE ProductRecommendations ( 
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  product_id INT, 
  customer_id INT, 
  recommendation_score FLOAT, 
  recommendation_date TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(100),
    customer_age INT,
    customer_gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE product_catalog (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    product_category VARCHAR(50),
    product_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    product_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    order_quantity INT,
    order_total DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE product_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    review_rating INT,
    review_comment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE personalized_content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    content_type VARCHAR(20),
    content_text TEXT,
    content_date DATE
)
